title: After character select my screen goes black
body: Now I'm getting leaver status. i can't see anything but a black screen need help. already tried removing and reinstalling.

replies.body: This black screen can happen if your connection is struggling, so it can't download assets and get you over to the game server.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help troubleshoot this towards a fix.

DUDE I FOUND OUT HOW TO FIX IT.  

1.Open the League folder under Applications
2.Open Package Contents
3.Contents
4.LoL
5.Config
6.Open the file Game.cfg with textEdit
7.Go under General and change WindowMode from 0 to 1
 it worked for me
